title: Balance Renu Aromatherapy Soy Blend Candle 230g | Pastel Pines
description: Buy Balance Renu Aromatherapy Soy Blend Candle 230g with the highest quality and affordable rates. Contact us for the bulk buy. Enquire Now!
cleaned_text: Balance Renu Aromatherapy Soy Blend Candle 230g RECAN230BAL Relax your mind and body with the Renu Aromatherapy Balance soy wax candle containing natural Essential Oils. Our Balance candle contains fragrance notes of Guava & Lychee with natural Orange Essential Oil. Each of our candles is hand-poured in Windsor, New South Wales. We use only the highest quality soy and vegetable wax, Australian fragrance and cotton wicks to ensure your candle burns beautifully for over 25+ hours.
